rows.label: tev001211_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, um...
Please take me with you on the mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001211_MSG0020
rows.name:
I've been cooking to distract myself, but
my head's full of so many "what ifs"...
I can only burn so many eggs, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001211_MSG0050
rows.name:
Thanks very much!
I'll do my best, like you know I can![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001211_MSG0080
rows.name:
...I understand. I'll look for something to
keep busy with. Hopefully something that
involves less smoke...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001211_MSG0090
rows.name:
NLA's gone... It was our second home,
and I always hoped it'd be forever...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001211_MSG0100
rows.name:
But...if everything goes to plan,
I'm sure we'll be able to rebuild.
As long as we're alive, there's hope![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001211_MSG0110
rows.name:
So let's win this!
No ifs, no buts, no maybes![ST:wait ]
